metadata.title: CVE-2015-7514 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenStack Ironic 4.2.0 through 4.2.1 does not "clean" the disk after use,which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7514` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ironic-api - 1:5.1.2-0ubuntu1
ironic-common - 1:5.1.2-0ubuntu1
ironic-conductor - 1:5.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-ironic - 1:5.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ironic package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.1.2-0ubuntu1').
